Translations.Text: Ni shuo: Zhenzhu zuo wo he ni zhi jian de jianzheng yijing goule. Ta zhidao tiandi jian de yiqie, quexin xieshen er buxin zhenzhu zhe, que shi kui she de.
Tamen yaoqiu ni zaori zhaoshi xingfa, jiaruo meiyou dingqi, namo xingfa bi yi jianglin tamen. Dang tamen buzhi bu jue de shihou, xingfa biding huran jianglin tamen.
Tamen yaoqiu ni zaori zhaoshi xingfa. Huo yu biding shi baowei buxindao zhe de.
Zai na ri, xingfa jiang cong tamen de tou shang he jiaoxia jianglin tamen. Ta shuo: Nimen changshi nimen de xingwei de guobao ba!
Wo de xindao de purenmen a! Wo de dadi que shi kuanda de, nimen yingdang chongbai wo.
Mei yige you xi qi de, dou yao chang si de ziwei, ranhou, nimen jiang bei zhao guiyu wo.
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, wo bi shi tamen zai leyuan zhong de ju zaixia lin zhu he de lou shang, tamen jiang yong ju qizhong. Gongzuo zhe de baochou zhen hao!
Tamen shi jianren de, tamen zhi xintuo tamen de zhu.
Xuduo dongwu, buneng danfu ziji de jiyang, zhenzhu gongji tamen he nimen, ta shi quan cong de, shi quanzhi de.
Ruguo ni wen tamen: Shei chuangzaole tiandi, zhifule ri yue? Tamen biding shuo: Zhenzhu. Tamen shi ruhe huangmiu de!
Zhenzhuyao shi nage puren de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu,(yao shi nage pu ren de jiyang jiongpo,) jiu shi ta jiongpo, zhenzhu que shi quanzhi wanshi de.

Ruguo ni wen tamen: Shei cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui? Er jie yushui shi yi si de dadi fuhuo ne? Tamen biding shuo: Zhenzhu. Ni shuo: Yiqie zansong quan guizhenzhu! Buran, tamen daban shi bu liaojie de.
